Title: Prohibits a law enforcement officer from initiating a traffic stop for certain violations of the vehicle and traffic law
Summary: Prohibits a law enforcement officer from initiating a traffic stop for certain violations of the vehicle and traffic law; provides for the suppression or exclusion of evidence obtained in violation of such provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง1106, V & T L; amd ยง710.20, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to limiting the frequency of traffic stops for minor violations in furtherance of racial equity and public safety; and to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to the basis for a motion to suppress or exclude evidence
